Entries.AnimalBirth: During the night, {0} brought a baby {1} into the world.
Letzte Nacht brachte {1} {0} ihre zur Welt Nachwuchs!
Durante la noche {0} trajo un bebé {1} al mundo.
夜のうちに、{0}は赤ちゃん{1}を世界に持ち込みました！
Durante a noite, {0} trouxe um bebê {1} para o mundo.
到了晚上，{0}带了一个婴儿{1}进入这个世界。

Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11311: Great! I'll send little {0} to their new home right away.
Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11314: Great! I'll send little {0} to their new home right away.

Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11311: ¡Guay! Enviaré el {0} a su nuevo hogar inmediatamente.
Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11314: ¡Guay! Enviaré el {0} a su nuevo hogar inmediatamente.

Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11311: 毎度どうも！{0}はすぐにあたらしいおうちに送っておくね。

Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11311: В совершенстве! {0} уже ждет вас в новом доме.

Entries.PurchaseAnimalsMenu.cs.11314: 很好！我立即向他们的新家发了一个小{0}。

Entries.MoodMessage_NewHome_Baby_Male: {0}'s still a little clumsy from being born. They're curious about their new world.

Entries.MoodMessage_DisturbedByDog_Female: {0} looks stressed and paranoid today. It seems like something bad happened last night.

Entries.MoodMessage_NewHome_Baby_Male: {0} ist nach der Geburt immer noch etwas peinlich. Sie sind neugierig auf ihre neue Welt.

Entries.MoodMessage_NewHome_Adult_Male_1: {0} scheint neugierig, aber ein bisschen vorsichtig. Sie gewöhnen sich an ihr neues Zuhause.
